author: Drew FitzGerald
title: Sprint, T-Mobile Agree to $26 Billion Merger
text:
The boards of Sprint Corp. and T-Mobile US Inc. struck an all-stock $26 billion merger that, if allowed by antitrust enforcers, would leave the U.S. wireless market dominated by three national players.
It is the third time in recent years that the two rivals have attempted the combination. But the leaders of both companies are determined to close a deal, if only because their prospects going it alone grow dimmer by the year.
New...
